message.body: Got yr rad rad rad package yesterday.love it. Thank you. Not going to starry, study town in NYC. How is yr friend feeling? Also, hi!
Yah!!!! So so so glad you liked it!!! I'm in study town too.
Ryan is not doing well unfortunately. He had a brief shift immediately after tx but now no changes. He's back to feeling really dizzy and fatigued.

I have a question for you. Could I stay overnight with you in NYC next Saturday (the 23rd)? I'm in town for clean needle exam that day till 5:30pm and would love to stay overnight then go to Sunday brunch with you? I can definitely go back to Philly that
That would be awesome! You can stay for sure. I have class both sat and sun 9-5, so maybe brunch could be Saturday dinner?
I'm sorry about Ryan. I wish illness was not so vast and confusing to identify.
Sounds good!!! I will be at PCOM till 5 or 5:30 next Saturday. I can text you when I'm out. We can leave for school/the bus together Sunday morning! Woo hoo!
Great! Yay!
Oh also, my roommate has a dog. Don't know if yr allergic
I'm super sorry to Ryan too. I'm not sure what to do about it.
No allergies! Where do you live by the way? Lol
Don't need to bring yr guns this trip
Yah! Great!!!
What neighborhood in Brooklyn is that?
The projects....
No, it basically fort greene/bed stuy. I live on the borderline basically
both neighborhoods are huge, it feels like one big playground
I'm excited to see you!
Same!!
The last two study groupers not at Starry Skies. We can wear cute clothes and text a photo to Laura. :) xoxoxo
Yeah!!!
